title: [bug] NSIS updater not working out of the box

labels.name: status: needs triage
labels.description: This issue needs to triage, applied to new issues

body:
### Describe the bug

I set up the updater for nsis with all the default settings. When launching, I get the notification for an update, pressing yes, a cmd terminal window appears and then the entire program closes.

I've tried using msi instead and the problem disappeared. I'm also making appimage builds and that's working fine too. I don't know how to get any debug info why it's failing. I've tried different physical machines too all on windows 11. 

https://github.com/tauri-apps/tauri/assets/8362329/6baeb760-07b2-441c-9db5-d4eaf29b2f41



### Reproduction

_No response_

### Expected behavior

_No response_
